mapper.insert: insert into user (user_ID, user_PWD, user_Nickname, location_ID, user_EXP, user_Profile, user_Date) values( #{user_ID}, #{user_PWD}, #{user_Nickname}, #{location_ID}, #{user_EXP}, #{user_Profile}, #{user_Date})
mapper.update: update user set user_ID=#{user_ID}, user_PWD=#{user_PWD}, user_Nickname=#{user_Nickname}, location_ID=#{location_ID}, user_EXP=#{user_EXP}, user_Profile=#{user_Profile}, user_Date=#{user_Date} where user_ID = #{user_ID}
mapper.select: select user_ID, user_PWD, user_Nickname, location_ID, user_EXP, user_Profile, user_Date from user order by user_ID desc, user_Date desc
